source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000010_PIPIN<tab>Pray join me in welcoming our Scion allies, but recently returned from their mission to the Far East. We have been most eager to hear a firsthand account of your time there, eventful as we understand it was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000010_PIPIN<tab>Avant tout, je suis à la fois heureux et soulagé de voir les Héritiers de la Septième Aube revenus sains et saufs de Doma. L'un d'entre vous aurait-il l'obligeance de nous expliquer ce qui s'est passé dans ces lointaines contrées orientales<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000020_ALISAIE<tab>Very well, allow me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000020_ALISAIE<tab>Avec plaisir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>...Such victories are rarely won without sacrifice. But the prize is worth the price. Doma free, after all these years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Malgré les nombreux sacrifices que cela a exigé, Doma a donc réussi à se libérer du joug de l'Empire.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000040_CONRAD<tab>Bloody hells... Flooding their own castle for a better chance at victory...
We could learn a thing or two from that lad.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000040_CONRAD<tab>Je suis im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né par le choix courageux des rebelles domiens d'inonder leur château pour protéger leur peuple... À nous de nous inspirer de leur détermination.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000050_PIPIN<tab>Our agents report a flurry of communications between Garlemald and Ala Mhigo in recent days. 'Tis plain they are in the midst of deliberating their response to the Doman uprising.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000050_PIPIN<tab>Nos espions nous ont signalé une brusque augmentation des communications entre l'état-major de la 12e légion et Garlemald au cours des derniers jours. Ils cherchent un moyen de gérer leur défaite à Doma, j'imagine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000060_RAUBAHN<tab>Good. Every imperial unit in occupied territory will be on the lookout for civil unrest. The fear of leaving critical locations undefended will make commanders think twice about committing their forces─giving us a chance to seize the initiative.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000060_RAUBAHN<tab>Oui, et ils se préparent sûrement à d'éventuels soulèvements dans d'autres provinces. Autrement dit, nous devons agir au plus vite.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000070_CONRAD<tab>We have a chance, aye─mayhap the last one we're ever gonna get.
While we've done our best to rebuild the Resistance, the imperials have only increased their efforts to root out sympathizers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000070_CONRAD<tab>En effet, c'est peut-être là notre dernière chance de recouvrer notre liberté. Nous avons fait tout notre possible pour renforcer nos effectifs, mais l'armée impériale a également intensifié sa traque des éléments perturbateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000080_CONRAD<tab>If we keep on playing for smaller prizes, it's only a matter of time before they crush us again. And that we won't come back from.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000080_CONRAD<tab>Si nous attendons davantage, nous serons immanquablement anéantis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000090_PIPIN<tab>A swift advance seems best for all concerned. Not least poor Mistress Krile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000090_PIPIN<tab>N'oublions pas non plus que les Garlemaldais ont enlevé dame Baldesion. Il nous faut la délivrer avant qu'il ne lui soit fait du mal. Nos forces doivent se mettre en marche le plus tôt possible.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000100_RAUBAHN<tab>Then let us waste no more time.
The campaign for Ala Mhigan liberation begins now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000100_RAUBAHN<tab>Que toutes les unités se préparent pour l'offensive<var 1D /var>! L'heure de la libération d'Ala Mhigo a sonné<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000110_RAUBAHN<tab>Our first objective will be to capture Castellum Velodyna. Take the bridge,
and the whole of the Fringes will be ours. From there, we can push east
towards the Peaks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000110_RAUBAHN<tab>Notre premier objectif est Castellum Velodyna<var 1D /var>! Prendre cette forteresse nous permettra d'avoir le contrôle des Marges de Gyr Abania et de donner ensuite l'assaut sur Les Pics<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000120_RAUBAHN<tab>I name this operation Rhalgr's Beacon. For as Rhalgr once sent His star to guide our ancestors to these lands, so too shall it see us home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000120_RAUBAHN<tab>L'opération “Comète de Rhalgr” est en marche<var 1D /var>! Que l'astre lancé à travers la nuit par le Destructeur nous inspire<var 1D /var>! Nous allons briser l'armée impériale de Garlemald<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000130_CONRAD<tab>It's begun, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000130_CONRAD<tab>Les hostilités ont commencé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000140_MNAAGO<tab>Good. It's the waiting that drives me mad. Standing around, knowing what's to come. I'll never get used to it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000140_MNAAGO<tab>Cette attente est insupporrrtable. Je ne me ferai jamais à l'instant qui précède une bataille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000150_LYSE<tab>Calm down, Naago. You're making her nervous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000150_LYSE<tab>Du calme, M'naago. Tu vas transmettre ta nervosité à ta monture.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000160_LYSE<tab>We've come this far, haven't we? We just need to make it the rest of the way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000160_LYSE<tab>Crois-moi, nous vaincrons. Cela ne fait aucun doute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000170_MNAAGO<tab>Right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000170_MNAAGO<tab>Tu as rrraison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000180_CONRAD<tab>Looks like the bastards went for the bait. The bridge is ours for the taking!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000180_CONRAD<tab>L'ennemi a mordu à l'hameçon. Profitons que l'Alliance éorzéenne l'ait attiré hors de sa base pour nous y infiltrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000190_CONRAD<tab>Now remember, M'naago: I want you to make for the tower as soon as you see an opening and get that flag flying. We'll see to the fighting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000190_CONRAD<tab>M'naago, je te confie notre étendard. À toi de saisir le moment opportun pour atteindre la plus haute tour et le mettre à la place de celui de Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000200_MNAAGO<tab>I won't let you down, sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000200_MNAAGO<tab>Compte surrr moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000210_CONRAD<tab>Come, then! Rhalgr's star shall burn bright this day!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000210_CONRAD<tab>En route<var 1D /var>! Que la comète du Destructeur nous mène vers la victoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000220_FORDOLA<tab>Gods damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000220_FORDOLA<tab>Je vous aurai...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000230_LYSE<tab>No more running. No more hiding. Let's finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000230_LYSE<tab>C'est ce que tu crois... Je n'ai plus peur de rien. Les obstacles qui se mettront en travers de mon chemin, je les abattrai tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000240_LYSE<tab>Look! The flag!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000240_LYSE<tab>Regarde donc là-haut<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... L'étendard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000250_CONRAD<tab>The bridge is ours! Ala Mhigo, Ala Mhigo, Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000250_CONRAD<tab>Camarades<var 1D /var>! Nous pouvons crier victoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000260_ARENVALD<tab>[RALLYING CRY]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000260_ARENVALD<tab>Ouaiiih<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000270_ANANTASOLDIER<tab>[RALLYING CRY]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000270_ANANTASOLDIER<tab>Ouaiiih<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000280_FORDOLA<tab>Stand your ground! It's not over yet!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000280_FORDOLA<tab>Ces chiens croient-ils vraiment nous avoir déjà vaincus<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000281_RAUBAHN<tab>[LOUD ROAR]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000281_RAUBAHN<tab>Ouuuaaais<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000290_RAUBAHN<tab>Hark you, brothers and sisters! The bridge is ours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000290_RAUBAHN<tab>Ils ont réussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000300_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Velodyna is fallen!? Impossible!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000300_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Cet étendard<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Castellum Velodyna serait tombé aux mains de l'ennemi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000310_RAUBAHN<tab>We have them on the run! Forward! No mercy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000310_RAUBAHN<tab>La victoire est à nous<var 1D /var>! Éliminez tous les soldats impériaux jusqu'au dernier<var 1D /var>! Pas de quartier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000320_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Regroup, regroup... We have to regroup! All units─ Fall back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000320_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Merde... Sauve qui peut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000330_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>Commander! The 4th Cohort has been routed! We'll be at the mercy of the enemy's reinforcements if we don't fall back now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000330_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>Commandante<var 1D /var>! Les rangs de la 4e cohorte ont été brisés. D'autres troupes ennemies ne vont pas tarder à arriver ici. Nous devons sonner la retraite<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000340_FORDOLA<tab>Idiot! We have the stronger force by far! Don't be taken in by their tricks!
Or would you rather tell Zenos you lost to this rabble!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000340_FORDOLA<tab>Imbécile<var 1D /var>! Ne te laisse pas avoir par leurs ruses<var 1D /var>! Nous avons encore largement le dessus<var 1D /var>! Et puis, comment l'expliquerais-tu au seigneur Zenos, si nous abandonnions le castellum maintenant<var 1D /var>!?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000350_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>No, but if the snakes betray us in the confusion, we'll have no way out!
I'm begging you, Commander─give the order, or we'll all die here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000350_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>Mais si jamais les guerrières anantas à l'est d'ici profitent de la situation pour se retourner contre nous, nous serons pris à revers et nous n'aurons aucun moyen de nous échapper<var 1D /var>! Nous avons tout intérêt à nous replier pour réorganiser nos effectifs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000360_FORDOLA<tab>...As common traitors who drank of muddied waters. For all the good it did us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000360_FORDOLA<tab>Grrr... Il est hors de question que je me laisse vaincre<var 1D /var>! Pas après tous ces sacrifices<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000370_FORDOLA<tab>Skulls, with me! The day is theirs, and so is this bastard bridge.
Someone bring the snake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000370_FORDOLA<tab>Ordre à tous les hommes de se retirer<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Et qu'on n'oublie pas notre otage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000380_LYSE<tab>Damn it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000380_LYSE<tab>Ils s'enfuient<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000390_CONRAD<tab>Let them go, Lyse! We've done what we came here to do.
That's enough for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000390_CONRAD<tab>Ce n'est pas grave, Lyse<var 1D /var>! Nous avons gagné, c'est tout ce qui compte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000400_LYSE<tab>...I suppose. It's our first victory, isn't it? And that has to be worth something.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000400_LYSE<tab>Même si ce n'est que le début, nous avons réussi à libérer une partie de notre pays.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000410_MNAAGO<tab>Ah, you've come. Welcome, friends, to my village. My home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000410_MNAAGO<tab>Ah, vous voilà. Soyez les bienvenus dans le village des M. C'est ici que je suis née et que j'ai grrrandi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>How fare your people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les habitants ont été épargnés, j'espère...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000430_MNAAGO<tab>Good, all things considered. Better than the Ananta, at any rate...
They've sent an emissary. I'll take you to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000430_MNAAGO<tab>Oui, parrr chance, les Impériaux n'y ont fait aucune victime. Il semble y avoir eu du grabuge chez les Anantas, en revanche. Une des leurs est venue demander de l'aide. Allons écouter ce qu'elle a à dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000440_LYSE<tab>We're here to help. Will you tell us what happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000440_LYSE<tab>Voulez-vous bien nous dire ce qui s'est passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000450_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Aye. It began with a quarrel between the imperials and the Qalyana.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000450_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Il s'est produit un incident entre l'Empire et les Qalyanas. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000460_MNAAGO<tab>The Qalyana are another Ananta tribe─the strongest and the most influential.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000460_MNAAGO<tab>Vous devez savoir que les Qalyanas sont la plus influente des trrribus chez les Anantas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000470_MNAAGO<tab>Unlike the Vira, they want no part of our troubles. They swore fealty to the Empire and were content to remain within their borders.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000470_MNAAGO<tab>Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment aux Viras, qui coopèrent activement avec notre armée de libération, elles refusent de se battre. Après avoir juré fidélité à l'Empirrre, elles ont choisi de vivre recluses sur leur territoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000480_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Jussst ssso. The Qalyana forsssook their pride and the fight, and yielded to Garlemald long ago.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000480_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Tout à fait. Cela fait longtemps que les Qalyanas ont déposé les armes et ont été assujetties. Ssss...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000490_VIRASOLDIER<tab>But then a new commander was sssent to hold the black bridge.
She demanded the Qalyana sssurrender a hossstage, thisss Butcher.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000490_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Récemment, une jeune guerrière humaine, surnommée l'“Exécutrice”, a été envoyée pour commander les troupes du pont métallique. Elle a ordonné aux Qalyanas de lui livrer un otage. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000500_LYSE<tab>Fordola. It doesn't make sense, though... The Vira are the ones working with the Resistance. Why would she threaten the Qalyana?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000500_LYSE<tab>Il ne peut s'agir que de Fordola. Mais pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Ses vraies ennemies parmi les Anantas, ce sont pourtant vous, les Viras.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000510_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Because she is ignorant, like all imperials. She knows not the difference between Qalyana and Vira, nor does she care to learn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000510_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Les Garlemaldais nous méprisent et ne connaissent rien à nos coutumes. Ils ignorent sûrement la différence entre nos deux tribus. Ssss...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000520_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. All Fordola knew for sure was that the Resistance would come from
the west. She reasoned, therefore, that if the Ananta on the east bank turned their coats, she would be trapped. I take it the Qalyana had no choice but
to oblige her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je crois deviner leurs intentions<var 1D /var>: les Impériaux veulent éviter d'être attaqués sur deux fronts si jamais les Qalyanas se rebellent contre eux. Ont-ils réussi à obtenir un otage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000530_VIRASOLDIER<tab>No, they did not. The imperials left with the Qalyana broodmother's own daughter, Anamika.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000530_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Oui, malheureusement. Shanti, la chef des Qalyanas a été contrainte de leur remettre sa propre fille. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000540_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Long days and nightsss she looked out on the black bridge, weeping for her child. Until you came.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000540_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Après cela, elle a passé ses journées à observer le pont-forteresse en pleurant. C'est alors que vous l'avez pris d'assaut. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000550_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The broodmother knew at once which way the winds would blow. She and her warriors met with the fleeing imperials in the road and demanded that her daughter be returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000550_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Voyant les Impériaux en fuite, Shanti a appelé ses sœurs à bloquer leur retraite. Elle a ensuite sommé les soldats de lui rendre sa fille. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000560_LYSE<tab>Bad idea... Fordola's not the kind to take threats lying down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000560_LYSE<tab>Fordola n'est hélas pas du genre à obtempérer aussi facilement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000570_VIRASOLDIER<tab>You know her well. The Butcher turned her blade to Anamika and bade the Qalyana move aside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000570_VIRASOLDIER<tab>L'Exécutrice a en effet refusé. Elle a même menacé de tuer son otage afin de se frayer un passage. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000580_VIRASOLDIER<tab>But the broodmother would not yield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000580_VIRASOLDIER<tab>La chef des Qalyanas n'a pas voulu céder non plus, et cela a conduit à une tragédie. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000590_ALISAIE<tab>I know where this is going...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000590_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, non...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000600_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The Qalyana sssurrounded the imperials, one of whom, whether out of fear or ssstupidity, cut the child down. There was naught that could be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000600_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Se sentant menacé par les Anantas qui l'entouraient, un des Impériaux a frappé la fille de son épée. La pauvre s'est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment vidée de son sang sous le regard impuissant de sa mère. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000610_ALISAIE<tab>What madness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000610_ALISAIE<tab>Quelle horreur...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000620_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The true madnesss was yet to come. For in her dessspair, the Qalyana broodmother cried out for her daughter to be ressstored to life.
She bessseeched Sri Lakshmi's intercession.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000620_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Hélas, la tragédie ne s'arrête pas là. Dans sa détresse, Shanti a invoqué notre Déesse, Lakshmi, afin de rappeler son enfant à la vie<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>She summoned a primal, then and there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Invoqué, vous dites<var 1D /var>!?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000640_VIRASOLDIER<tab>That she did, if only for an inssstant. Bereft of courage and honor,
the broodmother sssought sssolace in her faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000640_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Oui. La chef des Qalyanas est une lâche, qui a abandonné tout honneur et refuse de se battre. Dans son chagrin, elle n'a trouvé de recours qu'auprès de notre Déesse. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000650_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The imperials fled in terror at the sssight of the goddesss, abandoning these lands to the Ananta...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000650_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Bien sûr, devant un tel spectacle, les soldats impériaux se sont im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment enfuis. Désormais, il ne reste plus là-bas que le cadavre de la jeune fille et Lakshmi. Ssss...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000660_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Now the Qalyana bid usss make pilgrimage, to pay proper ressspectsss.
Yet though we Vira revere Sri Lakshmi as the holiessst of the holy, we will not prossstrate ourssselves before Her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000660_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Cet incident a eu pour effet d'asseoir davantage la domination des Qalyanas. Désormais, elles veulent obliger les Viras à vénérer cet avatar. Or, malgré notre adoration pour Lakshmi, nous n'avons aucune intention de devenir des esclaves. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000670_ALISAIE<tab>And so you turned to us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000670_ALISAIE<tab>Et c'est pour cette raison que vous êtes venue demander notre aide, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000680_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Aye. All who have fought with the Resissstance have heard tell of the warrior. The eikon-ssslayer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000680_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Oui, mes sœurs qui ont combattu au sein de l'armée de libération m'ont dit qu'il y a parmi vous une personne assez brave pour affronter des dieux. Ssss...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believe we have heard enough. Inconvenient though the timing may be, if a primal has indeed been summoned, we can scarce afford to ignore it.
We must needs discuss how best to resolve this situation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si un nouveau Primordial a été invoqué, nous ne pouvons en effet pas rester les bras croisés. Permettez-nous d'en discuter entre nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000700_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Why, Missstresss... Why does my Anamika ssslumber ssstill?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000700_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Ô Lakshmi, ô Déesse de la grâce et de la tendresse... Écoute ma plainte, et dis-moi pourquoi ma fille bien-aimée Anamica ne se réveille pas. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000710_LAKSHMI<tab>Look thee on her face, sssupplicant. Thy prayer hath been anssswered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000710_LAKSHMI<tab>Toi qui m'a appelée en ce monde matériel... Ton enfant est revenue d'entre les morts... Ta prière a été exaucée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000720_LAKSHMI<tab>Flesh sssundered hath been made whole. Blood ssspilt runneth through her veins. Breath ssstolen filleth her breassst.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000720_LAKSHMI<tab>Les blessures ont été guéries... Le sang répandu est retourné à l'enveloppe charnelle... Le souffle de la vie a été rendu...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000730_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>But she hears not her mother's words, nor sssees her mother's face!
She...she is sssilent...and empty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000730_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Mais alors, pourquoi n'entend-elle pas l'appel de sa mère<var 1D /var>? Pour quelle cruelle raison ne me répond-elle pas<var 1D /var>? Ssss...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000740_LAKSHMI<tab>Only the vesssel may be remade. Not so the flame which flickered within.
Her soul hath been scattered to the four winds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000740_LAKSHMI<tab>Mortelle... Sache que l'âme de ta fille a quitté son corps... Je puis soigner et rendre vie à sa dépouille, mais ce que tu exiges désormais de moi est toutefois au-delà de mon pouvoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Now do you see her promises for what they are!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Ça suffit<var 1D /var>! Combien de temps allez-vous implorer en vain cette Primordiale<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! Have you gone mad!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie<var 1D /var>! Mais qu'est-ce qui te prend<var 1D /var>!? Cache-toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Mayhap I have! But I refuse to stand by and watch yet another tragedy unfold!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Je suis désolée, Alphinaud, mais je ne peux pas rester indifférente à tant de peine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000780_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Who intrudes upon thisss sssacred ground!? Imperials thirsssting for blood!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000780_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Des humains<var 1D /var>! Des humains ont pénétré sur notre territoire sacré<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Êtes-vous venus nous exterminer<var 1D /var>!? Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000790_ALISAIE<tab>No! We come not to shed blood but to save you from the false god who would lead you astray!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000790_ALISAIE<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Écoutez-moi<var 1D /var>! Nous désirons seulement vous demander de ne plus faire appel à cette Primordiale<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000800_ALISAIE<tab>I understand how you feel, I do. You loved her with all your heart, but when the moment came, you still couldn't save her. The anguish, the anger...
I know it only too well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000800_ALISAIE<tab>Je comprends par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment la détresse et la douleur que la mort de votre enfant vous a infligées... Moi aussi, j'ai perdu quelqu'un qui m'était cher. Moi aussi, j'ai été submergée par la colère et le chagrin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000810_ALISAIE<tab>But I also know where this path leads! To embrace a primal is to condemn yourself to an endless cycle of despair. You will never know peace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000810_ALISAIE<tab>Mais en suppliant cette entité, vous ne faites que prolonger votre malheur. Vous n'obtiendrez jamais ainsi le soulagement que vous espérez. Vous vous en rendez bien compte, non<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000820_LAKSHMI<tab>A worm-eaten heart may find peace and ssserenity in ssservice. In beauty and grace. Thisss hath ever been my promissse. Naught elssse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000820_LAKSHMI<tab>Humaine irascible... Ce que tu dis est vrai. Je ne puis exaucer le vœu de cette mère. Toutefois, la chaleur et la douceur de mon aura ont le pouvoir d'apaiser son cœur meurtri, et de lui apporter du réconfort lors de ses prières.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000830_ALISAIE<tab>You tempt them with visions of things that can never be, and leave them bereft and wanting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000830_ALISAIE<tab>Les illusions que vous lui faites miroiter en dénaturant et en subjuguant son âme ne pourront jamais éliminer la source de son malheur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000840_ALISAIE<tab>No illusion, however sweet, can change the fact that your daughter is gone. Remember her as she was! Do not suffer this piteous shade to tarnish her memory!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000840_ALISAIE<tab>Vous devez faire face à votre peine<var 1D /var>! N'oubliez pas qui était votre fille de son vivant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000850_LYSE<tab>For every prayer that primal “answers,” it'll demand payment in kind. Do you have any idea how many more Ananta will die to feed its hunger for crystals!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000850_LYSE<tab>Alisaie a raison<var 1D /var>! Et puis, vous devez savoir que les Primordiaux ont besoin d'énormément de cristaux pour répondre à vos prières<var 1D /var>! Si vous vous obstinez dans cette voie, le territoire des Anantas dépérira<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000860_LAKSHMI<tab>They would have thee sssuffer man's ssspite and live in fear. Far better to dwell in my beauteousss dream than endure ssso ugly a reality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000860_LAKSHMI<tab>Pourtant, il est plus agréable de vivre dans mon rêve que dans la crainte provoquée par tes semblables...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000870_LYSE<tab>She's wrong! We hate the Empire as much as you! If you'd just listen─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000870_LYSE<tab>Si vous voulez parler des Impériaux qui sont à l'origine de cette tragédie, je vous garantis que nous allons nous occuper d'eux<var 1D /var>! Les Anantas n'ont pas besoin de votre protection<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000880_LAKSHMI<tab>Poor, misssguided children. I would ssspare you the tormentsss of thisss cruel and misshapen world. Come, basssk in my radiance. Let it fill your heartsss and free you from your burdens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000880_LAKSHMI<tab>Hélas, comment pourrais-je vous croire, vous et les vôtres<var 1D /var>? J'ai néanmoins la capacité de vous rendre obéissants et inoffensifs. Baignez dans ma douce clarté onirique et rejoignez les rangs de mes croyants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000890_ALISAIE<tab>[FRUSTRATED GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000890_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000900_LAKSHMI<tab>Abide in misery then, fools. The Ananta are more deserving of my blesssing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000900_LAKSHMI<tab>Vous refusez l'éclat de ma bien<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>te miséricorde, humains<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Qu'il en soit ainsi. Rien ne m'empêchera d'apporter le bonheur à toutes les Anantas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000910_LAKSHMI<tab>Leave these lands and my dreamers be. I will not warn you a second time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000910_LAKSHMI<tab>Partez, maintenant. Quittez le territoire de mes fidèles... Et dites à vos congénères de ne plus jamais s'en prendre à celles qui ont choisi de vivre dans l'extase du rêve...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000920_LYSE<tab>You did it again. You saved them. I just wish I could've been more help...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000920_LYSE<tab>Merci. Grâce à toi, cette région a été épargnée. J'aurais aimé me battre à tes côtés, mais Lakshmi m'aurait subjuguée en un instant...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000930_LYSE<tab>So...it looks like the Ananta did have a mountain of crystals after all.
Like every other tribe. Gods, we're all such slaves to our weaknesses...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000930_LYSE<tab>Les Anantas disposaient d'une quantité incroyable de cristaux. Cela démontre une fois de plus la faiblesse des êtres vivants...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>You! You ssslew our Missstresss! She was our hope, our sssalvation!
Is there no end to your cruelty!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Vous avez tué notre Déesse<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Quand cesserez-vous de vous acharner sur notre peuple<var 1D /var>!? Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000950_LYSE<tab>Listen to me, please! I know that you're only trying to protect yourselves because you feel frightened and alone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000950_LYSE<tab>Vous vous trompez sur nos intentions. Les humains et les Anantas ont un point commun<var 1D /var>: leur fragilité. Et pour y pallier, nous nous attachons à quelque chose...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000960_LYSE<tab>But that's how we all feel, don't you see? If we could just turn to each other for help instead of the gods, I'm sure we could find a way to live in peace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000960_LYSE<tab>Mais ce ne sont pas de Dieux dont nous avons besoin. Nous devons apprendre à nous entraider, à nous soutenir les uns les autres<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est qu'ainsi que nous pourrons nous comprendre mu<var 16 /var>tuel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000970_LYSE<tab>Your crystals are important to you, aren't they? Reflections of your souls, right? Well, you shouldn't have to sacrifice something so precious to a primal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000970_LYSE<tab>Mais dites-moi, ces cristaux dont vous vous parez, ils sont une image de vos âmes, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, vous devriez en prendre plus grand soin et ne pas les offrir à votre déesse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000980_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Who are you to quessstion our choice? You who fight without fear? We wish only to live in peace, and if thisss be the price we must pay, then ssso be it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000980_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Tout comme vous avez choisi de risquer vos vies pour gagner la guerre, nous Anantas donnons nos âmes pour ramener la paix<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000990_LYSE<tab>I know there's nothing I can say to convince you. But I hope that one day you look back and see we only ever wanted the same thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000990_LYSE<tab>Sachez que nous désirons également la paix. Même si ce n'est pas le cas aujourd'hui, peut-être qu'un jour nous trouverons un terrain d'entente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001000_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Begone, damn you! Ssspare me your hollow words and leave me to mourn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001000_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Cessez donc de souiller nos terres de votre présence<var 1D /var>! Partez<var 1D /var>! Je ne me laisserai pas tromper par vos paroles<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001010_LYSE<tab>I'll go...but it doesn't mean I'm giving up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001010_LYSE<tab>Comme vous voudrez... Mais ne comptez pas sur moi pour abandonner le combat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001020_LYSE<tab>Gyr Abania is our home too, and one way or another, we're going to have to learn to live together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001020_LYSE<tab>Que vous le vouliez ou non, nous sommes aussi chez nous en Gyr Abania<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001030_LYSE<tab>Come on. Alphinaud and Alisaie are waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001030_LYSE<tab>Allons-y. Alphinaud et Alisaie nous attendent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001039_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Royal Palace of Ala Mhigo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001039_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, au palais royal d'Ala Mhigo

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001040_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Imperial Tribunus Militum-)Ah, the savage returns. And with her tail firmly between her legs.
Beaten by beastmen, I hear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001040_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Chef d'état-major garlemaldais-)Regarde ça, la pseudo-citoyenne impériale est rentrée. Je mettrais ma main à couper qu'elle a pris ses jambes à son cou lorsqu'elle a été vaincue par les sauvages.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001050_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)'Twas a shameful display, by all accounts. She may have curried the viceroy's favor with her bold promises, but in the end, she's just another plodding bungler like the rest of her kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001050_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Commandant garlemaldais-)Ne sois pas si dur avec elle. Après toute la peine qu'elle s'est donnée afin de plaire au seigneur Zenos et d'obtenir son poste actuel, en arriver jusque-là pour une Mhigoise, c'est déjà un miracle, tu sais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001060_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Imperial Tribunus Militum-)Strange, you would think him a better judge of character. Then again, I hear she's not averse to a more physical mode of persuasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001060_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Chef d'état-major garlemaldais-)Tu as raison, je devrais me montrer un peu plus charitable avec cette pauvre fille... Mais dis donc, j'ai entendu des rumeurs selon lesquelles elle aurait utilisé bien plus que des mots pour obtenir les faveurs de notre général.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001070_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)Hah, I thought she rose through the ranks rather quickly. But no longer. If only she had been content with her lot, she might have lived to see the morrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001070_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Commandant garlemaldais-)Ça ne m'étonnerait qu'à moitié, à vrai dire. Ces barbares sont prêts à toutes sortes de débauches pour atteindre leurs buts, et elle ne fait sûrement pas exception. Quoi qu'il en soit, son récent échec lui sera fatal. Voilà ce qui arrive quand on veut quelque chose qu'on ne mérite pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001080_FORDOLA<tab>Fordola rem Lupis, commander of the Crania Lupi, reporting as ordered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001080_FORDOLA<tab>Commandante Fordola rem Lupus au rapport, Mon Général<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001090_ZENOS<tab>...Why do you tremble so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001090_ZENOS<tab>De quoi as-tu peur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001100_ZENOS<tab>Could it be that the Empire's Butcher is afraid? That she who walks with death is terrified of her own?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001100_ZENOS<tab>Se pourrait-il que la fameuse “Exécutrice” craigne la mort<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001110_FORDOLA<tab>I am terrified of dying having achieved naught. Gladly would I give my life to win a great victory on the battlefield, had I but the strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001110_FORDOLA<tab>Mon Général... J'ai surtout peur de mourir hors du champ de bataille sans avoir rien accompli. Je veux être fière de mes actes lorsque je rendrai mon dernier souffle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001120_ZENOS<tab>Alas, you do not. Indeed, you are weak. And born of this weakness is a blind fervor. A raging inferno which threatens to consume not only you, but everyone around you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001120_ZENOS<tab>Tu ne brilles certes pas par tes talents, mais je dois reconnaître que j'apprécie la façon dont l'ardeur de ta jeunesse enflamme tout ce qui t'entoure.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001130_FORDOLA<tab>Yes, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001130_FORDOLA<tab>Je...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001140_ZENOS<tab>You were defeated by the Resistance on several occasions.
You misjudged the Ananta and spurred them into summoning an eikon.
Have you anything to say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001140_ZENOS<tab>En plus d'avoir été vaincue par l'armée de libération, la manière dont tu as traité avec les Anantas les a conduites à invoquer un Primordial. Qu'as-tu à dire pour ta défense<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001150_FORDOLA<tab>I do not, my lord. My failures are my own.
I am prepared to accept your judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001150_FORDOLA<tab>Rien, Mon Général... J'ai péché par mon incapacité. Je suis prête à recevoir mon châtiment, quel qu'il soit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001160_ZENOS<tab>And that is very admirable. However, I've had enough of this dumb show. Give voice to that hunger I see in your eyes, or I will pluck them from your head.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001160_ZENOS<tab>Quelle admirable résignation... Mais je devine d'autres intentions. Dis-moi ce que tu désires réellement, ou je me ferai un plaisir de trancher cette tête.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001170_FORDOLA<tab>I...I want...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001170_FORDOLA<tab>Je veux plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001180_FORDOLA<tab>I want to make them pay! All of them! Everyone who ever mocked or looked down on me─I want the power to make them pay!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001180_FORDOLA<tab>... Plus de pouvoir. Pour écraser tous ceux qui me méprisent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001190_ZENOS<tab>...Hm. Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001190_ZENOS<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Voilà qui est mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001200_ZENOS<tab>Then I shall give you a chance. A chance to transcend your mortal limits. Assuming, that is, you are prepared to wager your life for such power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001200_ZENOS<tab>Dans ce cas, je vais te donner la chance d'obtenir une force surhumaine. Mais pour ça, il faut que tu sois prête à mettre ta vie en jeu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001210_FORDOLA<tab>Transcend, my lord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001210_FORDOLA<tab>Une force surhumaine<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001220_FORDOLA<tab>I came here prepared to die. Tell me what I must do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001220_FORDOLA<tab>Je m'étais préparée à mourir ici aujourd'hui. Si vous m'accordez un tel don, je n'ai aucune raison d'hésiter<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001230_LYSENARRATION<tab>I remember how they laughed. Alliance and Resistance soldiers,
eager for battle, trading jokes as we marched east towards the Peaks...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001230_LYSENARRATION<tab>Après avoir pris le contrôle des Marges de Gyr Abania,
l'armée de libération mhigoise et l'Alliance éorzéenne ont marché vers la région des Pics.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001240_LYSENARRATION<tab>Beyond this last line of defenses lay the Lochs and the city. Breaching it would be no small feat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001240_LYSENARRATION<tab>Le plus grand obstacle qui se dressait sur leur route était le réseau de défense
que les troupes impériales avaient établi dans cette zone montagneuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001250_LYSENARRATION<tab>But we beat the imperials back, just like that, and we liberated a village. The first of many...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001250_LYSENARRATION<tab>Toutefois, contre toute attente, l'ennemi n'avait opposé que peu de résistance,
et lorsque mes compagnons et moi sommes arrivés à Ala Ghiri, les lieux avaient déjà été sécurisés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001259_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, deep within an imperial research facility...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001259_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, dans un laboratoire impérial

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001260_FORDOLA<tab>My...my head...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001260_FORDOLA<tab>Aaaarrrgh... J'ai l'impression que ma tête va exploser...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001270_ZENOS<tab>Let us see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001270_ZENOS<tab>Comment va-t-elle<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001280_ZENOS<tab>So...she lives. Impressive...or merely lucky.
Though that too may prove a useful trait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001280_ZENOS<tab>Oh, tu as survécu. On peut dire que la chance est avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001290_FORDOLA<tab>My lord...what have you done to me...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001290_FORDOLA<tab>Mon Général... Que m'est-il arrivé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001300_DRUSUS<tab>Though we Garleans are intellectually and physiologically superior in almost all respects, we lack the hereditary traits required for the reliable manipulation of aether─hence our unique inability to wield magicks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001300_DRUSUS<tab>Nous autres Garlemaldais excellons dans tous les domaines, sauf dans la manipulation de l'éther. Autrement dit, nous ne pouvons pas utiliser la magie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001310_DRUSUS<tab>This deficiency, for want of a better word, saw us subjected to decades of oppression by the lesser races, and we were eventually driven to seek shelter in the cold northern reaches of Ilsabard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001310_DRUSUS<tab>C'est la raison pour laquelle notre peuple a été contraint autrefois de se réfugier dans les terres gelées au nord du continent d'Ilsabard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001320_DRUSUS<tab>Fortunately, said region was replete with vast deposits of ceruleum, which proved instrumental in the development of magitek: a revolutionary technology conceived to compensate for our disadvantage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001320_DRUSUS<tab>Par chance, les nombreux gisements de céruleum que nous avons découverts là-bas nous ont ensuite permis de mettre au point notre fantastique technologie magitek... Elle est en quelque sorte notre substitut à la magie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001330_DRUSUS<tab>It was with magitek that we grew strong─that our nation became an empire. Yet ultimately, this was an extrinsic solution to an intrinsic problem. What I wanted was not a crude device to be used in lieu of magic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001330_DRUSUS<tab>Grâce à elle, nous avons obtenu un immense pouvoir et soumis les autres nations. Toutefois, je n'ai personnellement que faire des substituts.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001340_DRUSUS<tab>Through modification of the Garlean genome, I argued that it might be possible to enhance a subject's ability to manipulate aether, effectively empowering them to wield magicks. Alas, my theories were met with consternation in the imperial court.
Only Lord Zenos, with commendable foresight and wisdom, deigned to support my research.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001340_DRUSUS<tab>Ce que je désire plus que tout, c'est permettre aux Garlemaldais d'acquérir la capacité d'utiliser la magie. Mes pairs ne voient pas mes recherches d'un bon œil, mais le seigneur yae Galvus comprend mes desseins et m'a même apporté son soutien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001350_FORDOLA<tab>...You gave me this treatment? But I'm not Garlean.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001350_FORDOLA<tab>C'est donc pour ça que vous avez pratiqué cette in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion sur moi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Mais je ne suis pas garlemaldaise...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001360_ZENOS<tab>Ala Mhigan, through and through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001360_ZENOS<tab>Ah, c'est vrai que tu es mhigoise...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001370_ZENOS<tab>What you have been granted is far greater than mere magic. Before that lesser light, it is as a second sun.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001370_ZENOS<tab>Rassure-toi, nous t'avons donné bien plus que la capacité de manipuler la magie. Tu détiens désormais un énorme pouvoir, aussi ardent qu'un brasier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001380_DRUSUS<tab>I am informed that Ala Ghiri was recently occupied by the Resistance, and that an attack on Specula Imperatoris is considered imminent. This could provide an ideal opportunity to test her performance in the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001380_DRUSUS<tab>Seigneur, on m'a informé que l'armée de libération avait pris le contrôle d'Ala Ghiri. Nos ennemis ne tarderont pas à attaquer Specula Imperatoris. Voici une occasion en or d'éprouver les nouvelles aptitudes de cette jeune femme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001390_ZENOS<tab>Your...Skulls, was it? They have joined the garrison at the watchtower?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001390_ZENOS<tab>Fordola. Ton unité des Crania Lupi participe à la défense de cette forteresse, il me semble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001400_FORDOLA<tab>...Yes, my lord. By your leave, I would rendezvous with them and lead a counterattack against the insurgents.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001400_FORDOLA<tab>En effet, Mon Général. Je vais im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment rejoindre mes hommes et intercepter les résistants.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001410_ZENOS<tab>No. Even were you to leave now, you would not arrive in time.
There is another duty I would entrust to you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001410_ZENOS<tab>Même en partant tout de suite, tu arriverais trop tard pour ça. Il y a une autre tâche que je veux te confier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001420_THANCRED<tab>...Found you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001420_THANCRED<tab>Enfin, je l'ai trouvée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ho! You've improved, lad!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001430_RAUBAHN<tab>Le bras m'en tombe<var 1D /var>! Tu es devenu un féroce combattant, Pipin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001440_PIPIN<tab>Come now, Father. You lured the fool onto my blade, and do not try to deny it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001440_PIPIN<tab>Père, ce n'est pas le moment de plaisanter. Admettez plutôt que vous avez vo<var 16 /var>lon<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment laissé cet ennemi vous attaquer pour que j'intervienne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001450_RAUBAHN<tab>Our work here is all but done. What of Conrad and his men?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001450_RAUBAHN<tab>Et moi qui espérais que tu n'y verrais que du feu... Mais dis-moi, as-tu des nouvelles de l'armée de libération<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001460_PIPIN<tab>They are for the main tower. The Skulls have offered fierce resistance thus far, but Conrad seems to believe he can convince them to lay down their arms...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001460_PIPIN<tab>Oui, elle se dirige ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment vers la tour principale. Cette fameuse unité impériale composée de jeunes Mhigois leur barre la route, mais Conrad veut les convaincre de déposer les armes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001470_RAUBAHN<tab>Then we will tend to the stragglers down below. With me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001470_RAUBAHN<tab>Très bien. Occupons-nous de leurs troupes au sol<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001480_FORDOLA<tab>Report.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001480_FORDOLA<tab>Quelle est la situation<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001490_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Enemy forces have overrun the lower facilities, and appear to be mounting an assault on the main tower. We have already received a request for reinforcements.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001490_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>L'ennemi a quasiment pris le contrôle de toutes les ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions au sol et essaie de pénétrer dans la tour principale. Nous avons reçu une demande de renforts.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001500_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>A unit of legionaries has been mustered and is ready to depart.
They await your orders, Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001500_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Nos hommes sont prêts à intervenir. Nous n'attendons plus que vos ordres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001510_FORDOLA<tab>Stand down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001510_FORDOLA<tab>Pas de renforts...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001520_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commander?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001520_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Pardon<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001530_FORDOLA<tab>Tell them to stand down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001530_FORDOLA<tab>Tu as bien entendu. Dis à tes hommes de rester à leurs postes.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001540_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commander, if I may! Our people─your people are still in there!
They will be slaughtered!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001540_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commandante... Vous n'ignorez pas que votre propre unité est engagée dans le combat. Allez-vous les laisser se faire massacrer<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001550_FORDOLA<tab>You think I don't know that!? I want nothing more than to help them─to lead the bloody charge─but I have my orders!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001550_FORDOLA<tab>J'ai les mains liées<var 1D /var>! J'ai moi-même demandé à commander les renforts, mais on me l'a refusé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001560_FORDOLA<tab>Lord Zenos said no reinforcements. He would have us use the main cannon to destroy the installation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001560_FORDOLA<tab>Le général yae Galvus a formellement interdit d'envoyer de l'aide. Au lieu de ça, il a donné l'ordre de tirer avec le grand canon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001570_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>What...kill our own soldiers!? You must be mistaken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001570_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Mais c'est de la folie<var 1D /var>! Nos troupes en pâtiront autant que nos ennemis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001580_FORDOLA<tab>Mayhap you'd like to ask Lord Zenos yourself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001580_FORDOLA<tab>Tu n'as qu'à le lui dire directement... Si tu en as le courage, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001590_FORDOLA<tab>I thought not. Initiate the firing sequence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001590_FORDOLA<tab>Je veux bien oublier cette insubordination, mais dépêche-toi de préparer le canon.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001600_FORDOLA<tab>Wars are won on the backs of the dead. Theirs and ours. There is no truth but this. We must remain firm and resolute, and always, always do our duty.
Now, give the order!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001600_FORDOLA<tab>S'il faut marcher sur les cadavres des nôtres pour obtenir la victoire, nous le ferons<var 1D /var>! Nous allons démontrer à l'ennemi à quel point nous sommes déterminés<var 1D /var>! Compris<var 1D /var>? Transmets mon ordre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001610_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Initiate firing sequence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001610_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Armez le canon<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001620_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>Aye, aye, initiating firing sequence!
Release safety locks...deploy main cannon!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001620_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>Phase de préparation enclenchée<var 1D /var>! Retrait des cales...
Inclinaison du canon en cours<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001630_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin...
For us. For our people. For our future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001630_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin... Vous ne mourrez pas en vain... Grâce à vous, les Mhigois retrouveront leur liberté...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001640_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>I need you to confirm the target, Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001640_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commandante, quelle est la cible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001650_FORDOLA<tab>Specula Imperatoris, main tower. Fire when ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001650_FORDOLA<tab>La tour principale de Specula Imperatoris. Ouvrez le feu dès que possible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>What in the seven hells!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'était<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001670_PIPIN<tab>Long-range artillery?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001670_PIPIN<tab>On dirait un tir de canon... mais ça venait de loin<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>Those treacherous bastards... Their people were still fighting!
Full retreat, now! Relay the orders!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>Les salauds... N'ont-ils aucune pitié pour leurs hommes<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Dis à toutes nos unités de battre en retraite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001690_PIPIN<tab>Understood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001690_PIPIN<tab>À vos ordres, Père<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001700_PIPIN<tab>All forces, retreat! I repeat: all forces, retreat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001700_PIPIN<tab>Cessez im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment le combat et repliez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001710_LYSE<tab>Conrad! Conrad! Speak to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001710_LYSE<tab>Tiens bon, Conrad<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>It...it was all so sudden. Conrad had just convinced the last few Skulls to surrender, when...when we heard the bang, and...and everything started to shake...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tout est arrivé si vite. Juste au moment où Conrad avait réussi à convaincre les Crânes de se rendre, l'Empire nous a tiré dessus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>We carried the survivors to safety, but Conrad is... We have done what we can for him. All that remains is to pray.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous avons évacué les rescapés. J'ai fait tout mon possible pour soigner les blessures de Conrad... Il ne nous reste plus qu'à prier pour qu'il s'en sorte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001740_CONRAD<tab>Ugh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001740_CONRAD<tab>Euuugh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001750_LYSE<tab>Conrad!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001750_LYSE<tab>Conrad<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001760_CONRAD<tab>Is...is that you, Lyse? Can't...can't see a damn thing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001760_CONRAD<tab>Lyse... C'est toi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Mes yeux... Je ne vois plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001770_CONRAD<tab>Well, that's that, then. Time's up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001770_CONRAD<tab>(souffle)... La fin est proche... pour moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001780_LYSE<tab>What are you talking about!? You'll be on your feet before you know it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001780_LYSE<tab>Je t'en prie, ne dis pas ça<var 1D /var>! Tu vas vite t'en remettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001790_CONRAD<tab>It's all right, Lyse. I've lived long enough. But listen... I want...I want you to lead the Resistance in my stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001790_CONRAD<tab>Non... Il est déjà trop tard... Lyse... Le temps est venu pour toi... de prendre la tête de l'armée de libération...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001800_LYSE<tab>Don't say another word! You'll recover─we'll recover! We'll bring freedom to Ala Mhigo together! We're not going to stop here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001800_LYSE<tab>Ne raconte pas de bêtises<var 1D /var>! Tu ne peux pas abandonner le combat maintenant<var 1D /var>! Nous avons besoin de toi pour nous mener à la victoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001810_CONRAD<tab>No...no, you won't. Everything we've built, everyone we've brought together...I know you'll show them the way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001810_CONRAD<tab>(souffle)... (souffle)... T-t-tu as raison... Nous ne pouvons pas abandonner... Nous sommes plus forts... et plus unis que jamais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001820_CONRAD<tab>You've got it in you, Lyse. Not because you're Curtis's daughter, or Yda's sister, but because...because you're you. Because you're you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001820_CONRAD<tab>Lyse... Crois-moi, tu en es capable... Non pas parce que tu es la fille de Curtis<var 1D /var>... ou la sœur d'Yda... Mais parce que tu as... le courage nécessaire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001830_LYSE<tab>Conrad...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001830_LYSE<tab>Conrad...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001840_CONRAD<tab>Lead them to victory. To freedom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001840_CONRAD<tab>Prends la relève... et conduis notre peuple... vers la liberté...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001850_LYSE<tab>I will, Conrad. I will. I promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001850_LYSE<tab>Tu as ma parole. Notre rêve se réalisera. Tu peux reposer en paix, héros d'Ala Mhigo...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001859_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the chaos of Castrum Abania...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001859_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, à Castrum Abania

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001860_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Next round! Double the charge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001860_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Dépêchez-vous de préparer le canon pour tirer à nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001870_ESTINIEN<tab>Come, Nidhogg. We are needed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001870_ESTINIEN<tab>Nidhogg... Prête-moi ta force encore une fois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001880_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>That's the ceruleum pipeline!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001880_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>Il y a une brèche dans le conduit de céruleum<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001890_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Impossible! How can one man─ Shoot the bastard! Shoot him!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001890_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Impossible<var 1D /var>! Aucun humain n'aurait assez de force pour le percer<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...
Abattez ce monstre<var 1D /var>! Feu à volonté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001900_ESTINIEN<tab>Heh. My lance has slain far greater beasts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001900_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmpf<var 1D /var>! Rien ne peut résister à la lance de Nidhogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001910_ESTINIEN<tab>...You're welcome, boy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001910_ESTINIEN<tab>Maintenant, nous sommes quittes, gamin...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001920_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Notify all units─I want that intruder found!
And get the engineers to fix my bloody cannon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001920_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Il a réussi à s'enfuir<var 1D /var>!? Que l'unité d'interception retrouve sa trace<var 1D /var>! Je veux également un rapport complet sur les dégâts<var 1D /var>! Le canon doit être réparé im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001930_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>The savages are coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001930_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Les sauvages vont déferler sur nous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001940_ALISAIE<tab>Are you all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001940_ALISAIE<tab>Tout va bien<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001950_ALISAIE<tab>Ah...I think that answers my question.
We have accomplished our objectives as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001950_ALISAIE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001955_ALPHINAUD<tab>Understood. We're on our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001955_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Bien reçu. On arrive dès que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse's unit should be advancing upon the fire control center in the command tower. Let us join them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse et ses hommes ont déjà lancé l'assaut contre la tour où se trouve le poste de contrôle du canon. Rejoignons-les.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse! Thank the Twelve you're all right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse<var 1D /var>! Content de te voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001980_LYSE<tab>And you! There's the control center. Let's hit them hard and fast. Ready?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001980_LYSE<tab>Et moi donc<var 1D /var>! Il ne nous reste plus qu'à nous emparer de la salle de commandement... Ça va chauffer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001990_FORDOLA<tab>They're here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001990_FORDOLA<tab>Tenez-vous prêts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002000_LYSE<tab>It was you, wasn't it... Wasn't it!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002000_LYSE<tab>Fordola... C'est toi qui as donné l'ordre de tirer avec ce canon, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002010_FORDOLA<tab>Aye, I gave the order to fire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002010_FORDOLA<tab>On ne peut rien te cacher.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002020_LYSE<tab>It was over! The Skulls had surrendered! No one else had to die!
And you killed them! Your own people! Your own comrades!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002020_LYSE<tab>Conrad venait juste de convaincre les Crânes, tes hommes, d'arrêter de se battre contre leurs frères et sœurs mhigois<var 1D /var>! Et toi, tu les as tous massacrés<var 1D /var>! Tes soldats<var 1D /var>! Tes camarades<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002030_FORDOLA<tab>You're right. I killed them. Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin, all the rest─trained and fought with every last one of them. Good soldiers to a man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002030_FORDOLA<tab>Oui, c'est moi qui les ai tués. Emelin, Ansfrid, Hrudolf... J'ai grandi avec eux... J'ai appris à combattre à leurs côtés... Ils étaient mes compagnons d'armes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002040_FORDOLA<tab>I gave the order that led to their deaths...and I knew exactly what I was doing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002040_FORDOLA<tab>Ils ont péri à cause de mon ordre. Depuis, je suis hantée par leur mort...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002050_LYSE<tab>But why!? Why would you do that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002050_LYSE<tab>Mais pourquoi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Pourquoi as-tu fait ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002060_FORDOLA<tab>They died so that all Ala Mhigans could live free. That was all we ever wanted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002060_FORDOLA<tab>C'était un sacrifice nécessaire pour que les Mhigois recouvrent leur fierté. Eux aussi, c'est ce qu'ils désiraient le plus au monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002070_FORDOLA<tab>We made a promise that we would do whatever it took so that one day...one day the imperials would learn to accept us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002070_FORDOLA<tab>Nous nous étions juré de devenir assez forts pour clouer le bec de ces vaniteux de Garlemaldais... pour qu'ils ne puissent plus nous rabaisser à cause de nos origines.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002080_FORDOLA<tab>But everything comes at a price. And if you haven't got the means to pay, then you pay with blood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002080_FORDOLA<tab>Tout a un prix. Ceux qui n'ont rien paient avec leur sang.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002090_FORDOLA<tab>Service guarantees citizenship, but citizenship guarantees naught. It's not enough to do your part, oh no. You have to run faster, fight harder, kill more and more and more─and only then will you be equal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002090_FORDOLA<tab>Les habitants des provinces impériales servent dans l'armée pour acquérir le statut de citoyen. Cependant, s'ils continuent à se faire discriminer par les Garlemaldais, leur seule solution est d'obtenir plus de prestige en brillant sur le champ de bataille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002100_FORDOLA<tab>That's just how it is out here in the provinces. You buy your freedom with blood─there is no other way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002100_FORDOLA<tab>Ceux qui comme moi sont nés dans une Ala Mhigo contrôlée par l'Empire ne peuvent gagner leur liberté qu'ainsi<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002110_LYSE<tab>Shut up! Shut your mouth! You don't get to talk about freedom!
You killed your own! They trusted you and you killed them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002110_LYSE<tab>Mais ouvre les yeux, imbécile<var 1D /var>! Crois-tu vraiment être plus libre après avoir tué les gens qui avaient le plus confiance en toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002120_LYSE<tab>Murderer! Butcher! Traitor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002120_LYSE<tab>Comment as-tu pu sacrifier tes camarades aussi facilement<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Lyse!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Lyse, avec moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002140_LYSE<tab>Gotcha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002140_LYSE<tab>Touchée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002150_ALISAIE<tab>Huh!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002150_ALISAIE<tab>Aaargh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002160_FORDOLA<tab>I know what you can do. I've already seen it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002160_FORDOLA<tab>Ce n'est pas avec ce genre d'attaques que vous m'aurez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002180_FORDOLA<tab>Even so, the odds are against me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002180_FORDOLA<tab>Désolée, mais nous allons devoir remettre ça à une autre fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002190_LYSE<tab>Coward! Get back here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002190_LYSE<tab>Grrr<var 1D /var>! Tu comptes encore t'enfuir, espèce de lâche<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002200_FORDOLA<tab>Hero! Lord Zenos invites you to join him for the royal hunt, to be hosted at the palace. You may bring your horde, if you like. All are welcome.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002200_FORDOLA<tab>J'ai un message de la part du général yae Galvus pour toi, héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var> des sauvages... “Tu es invité<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à une partie de chasse impériale<var 1D /var>! Conduis ta meute au palais d'Ala Mhigo<var 1D /var>!”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>She'll be all right, but we'll need to carry her. Will you help me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je lui ai prodigué les premiers soins. À présent, j'ai besoin de la mettre en sûreté. Vous voulez bien m'aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. Lyse, I leave matters here in your hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci. Lyse, tu ferais pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment mieux de rester ici pour garder les lieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002230_LYSE<tab>Uh, right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002230_LYSE<tab>D'accord...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>I wanted to show you this house. My house.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>Ah, je suis content que vous soyez venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s. Je tenais à vous montrer cette maison. C'est ici que je suis né.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002250_LYSE<tab>You mean...this is where you grew up?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002250_LYSE<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye. Not much to look at, is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Oui. Comme vous pouvez le constater, elle ne paie pas de mine.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>Same could be said of the village. It was damn near impossible to live off
the land, barren as it was─which is why so many of us traded our plowshares for swords.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>On peut en dire autant de tout le village, en fait... L'aridité des terres permettant à peine de nourrir la population, il était fréquent que des jeunes partent offrir leurs services comme mercenaires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002280_RAUBAHN<tab>Swords and uniforms, mind. We became military men. Tensions were rising between Ala Mhigo and the Empire, and there was always a need for more soldiers to watch the border. 'Twas only a matter of time before the first skirmishes broke out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002280_RAUBAHN<tab>C'était mon cas aussi. J'avais été engagé par l'armée mhigoise et j'étais chargé de surveiller la frontière à l'époque où la tension avec l'Empire était devenue palpable. Il n'a pas fallu longtemps avant que les premières escarmouches éclatent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>It is a frightening thing to face magitek armor for the first time. But after a lot of trial and error, I found ways to bring them down. After a few victories, people even said I had a knack for it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>Nous ne faisions pas le poids face à la puissance de feu des armes magitek, et j'ai dû faire appel à toute ma ruse pour combattre efficacement. Après quelques victoires, mes camarades faisaient tous l'éloge de mes talents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002300_RAUBAHN<tab>And then one day they hit us. Hard. I was wounded and sent home to recover. Back here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002300_RAUBAHN<tab>Hélas, un tireur d'élite ennemi m'a blessé grièvement lors d'une bataille, et j'ai dû rentrer au village le temps de ma convalescence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002310_CURTIS<tab>Will you remain silent for fear of the mad king's vengeance? Of his eyes and ears in the shadows and his knives in the dark? You who call this “living” dishonor our nation─it is but a slow death!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002310_CURTIS<tab>Les habitants de la capitale vivent quo<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>dien<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment dans la peur<var 1D /var>! Celle de subir la tyrannie de notre souverain Theodoric<var 1D /var>! Celle d'être la cible des dénonciateurs qui lui obéissent aveuglément<var 1D /var>! Si nous ne nous soulevons pas, si nous ne renversons pas ce despote, nous n'avons aucun avenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002320_CURTIS<tab>Liberty or death. Liberty or death! If this be your creed, then raise up your hands! Raise up your voices! Together we will tear Theodoric from the throne! Together we will reclaim our freedom!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002320_CURTIS<tab>“La liberté ou la mort<var 1D /var>!”<var 1D /var>... S'il y en a parmi vous en qui ces mots résonnent, qu'ils lèvent la main<var 1D /var>! Nous les accueillerons dans nos rangs, et ensemble, nous lutterons contre l'oppression<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002330_CURTIS<tab>Sent you home to mend, did they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002330_CURTIS<tab>Cette blessure est de celles qu'on reçoit sur un champ de bataille... Tu reviens du front<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002340_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, sir. Garleans got the better of us. The...the chirurgeons say I'm healing well, so it won't be long now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002340_RAUBAHN<tab>Oui, j'ai combattu l'armée impériale au cours d'un accrochage à la frontière. Lorsque je serai guéri, je compte me joindre à votre lutte, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002350_CURTIS<tab>Liberty or death, is it? Tell me, soldier: what do you think those words mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002350_CURTIS<tab>Tu m'en vois réjoui, camarade. Mais dis-moi, quel sens a la phrase “la liberté ou la mort” pour toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002360_RAUBAHN<tab>We...we must needs be willing to die for liberty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002360_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmmm... Je pense qu'il s'agit du choix qui s'offre à nous tous<var 1D /var>: se battre pour la liberté, ou être tué par le tyran qui nous gouverne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002370_CURTIS<tab>Spoken like a true patriot. But liberty should not be the end in of itself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002370_CURTIS<tab>Voilà une réponse digne d'un jeune homme plein de force et de fougue... Mais il s'agit en fait des seules issues que l'on est en droit d'attendre d'un combat...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002380_CURTIS<tab>Liberty is the chance to build something better. A stronger, more prosperous home for our people. It's not quick or easy work, and it is never truly finished─but if you neglect it, then sooner or later, you look up to find you've traded one tyrant for another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002380_CURTIS<tab>L'être humain est par nature avare et dominateur, et il est facile de se laisser tenter par l'appât du gain et la soif de pouvoir lors d'une lutte comme la nôtre. Ces choses, nous ne devons les acquérir qu'au prix de nombreux efforts une fois que nous serons devenus libres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002390_RAUBAHN<tab>Well, sir, I...I've never asked for much. Never wanted to live like a king─just wish it were a little bit easier is all. For me and everyone else. And I'm...I'm willing to die for that, if that's what it takes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002390_RAUBAHN<tab>Je comprends. L'autorité et la fortune des classes dirigeantes ne m'intéressent pas. Tout ce que je désire, c'est vivre humblement comme bon me semble<var 1D /var>! Et je suis prêt à mourir pour ça, s'il le faut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002400_CURTIS<tab>Dying is easy, soldier. Living is harder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002400_CURTIS<tab>Dans ce cas, tu as toutes les qualités nécessaires pour rejoindre notre mouvement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002410_CURTIS<tab>Rest. Mend. Regain your strength. You'll need it in the days to come...and mayhap one day we will need it too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002410_CURTIS<tab>Mais rien ne presse, mon ami. Soigne d'abord cette blessure comme il faut. L'heure où nous aurons besoin de tes talents viendra bien assez tôt.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002420_RAUBAHN<tab>Conrad chose you as his successor, Lyse, and I will not gainsay his decision.
I have but one question to ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002420_RAUBAHN<tab>Lyse, je sais que Conrad t'a demandé de prendre sa suite, et je ne doute nullement de ta détermination, mais il y a une question que j'aimerais te poser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Liberty or death. Those were Curtis's words, and his creed. Will you swear by your father's creed before your comrades and the gods?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ces mots que Curtis a inscrits ici, “la liberté ou la mort”... Es-tu prête à jurer, devant la personne qui t'a toujours soutenue, que tu resteras fidèle à l'idéal qu'ils expriment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002440_LYSE<tab>Liberty or death... That's all you can hope for in war. Father understood that...and you want to know if I do too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002440_LYSE<tab>C'est mon père qui a écrit ça<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Vous voulez donc que je promette en présence de notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de ne chercher rien d'autre que la liberté ou la mort dans notre combat<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002450_LYSE<tab>I swear to you, here and now:
I will fight until the end, be it liberty or be it death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002450_LYSE<tab>D'accord<var 1D /var>! Moi Lyse, je suis prête à me battre sans rien attendre de plus que la liberté ou la mort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002460_LYSE<tab>But the freedom we win must be for every Ala Mhigan─even ones like Fordola, though they may hate us, and the Ananta, though they may fear us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002460_LYSE<tab>Qu'il s'agisse des jeunes Mhigois nés sous l'occupation impériale ou des Anantas qui ont invoqué leur Primordiale, nous sommes tous des enfants de Gyr Abania. Pourtant, nous laissons nos différences être la source de discordes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002470_LYSE<tab>We'll fight and we'll talk and we'll find a way to make it work for all of us. Compared to all that, retaking our home will seem like the easy part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002470_LYSE<tab>C'est donc aussi pour favoriser notre rapprochement que nous devons chasser l'occupant garlemaldais et nous regrouper sous la bannière de la liberté. Je désire rebâtir Ala Mhigo sur de nouvelles bases<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002480_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmm. A good oath. Then there is naught else to say.
You are indeed your father's daughter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002480_RAUBAHN<tab>Voilà qui est bien dit. Ton père serait fier de toi, Lyse. Je n'ai aucune raison de douter de tes motivations. Ensemble, battons-nous pour libérer notre patrie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002490_LYSE<tab>Sorry to have kept you waiting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002490_LYSE<tab>Et voilà<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que tu en dis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002500_LYSE<tab>Well, what do you think? I know it's a bit old-fashioned...but in a traditional sort of way. Yda wore it whenever she could...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002500_LYSE<tab>Tu trouves que ça me va<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... C'est la tenue tra<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le des Mhigoises. Celle-ci appartenait à ma sœur, Yda.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002510_LYSE<tab>Not that I'm pretending to be her or anything! Not again. It's just...if this is the last battle we fight to free Ala Mhigo, then she ought to be a part of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002510_LYSE<tab>Je ne cherche pas à prendre à nouveau son identité. Je me suis juste dit que comme ça, elle sera en quelque sorte à mes côtés pour la grande bataille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It suits you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Elle te va très bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's not quite your style...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ce n'est pas tout à fait ton style.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002520_LYSE<tab>It's nice of you to say so. Aaand a bit embarrassing. But mostly nice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002520_LYSE<tab>Merci... Je dois t'avouer que ça me fait bizarre venant de toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002530_LYSE<tab>Oh, I know, right? All these stupid frills everywhere...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002530_LYSE<tab>Je le sais bien... En plus, je n'ai jamais aimé les vêtements tombants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002540_LYSE<tab>Well don't just stand there gawping! If you don't like it, just say so!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002540_LYSE<tab>Pourquoi tu ne dis rien<var 1D /var>!? Ne t'inquiète pas, je sais bien que ça ne me va pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002550_LYSE<tab>Anyway, the real reason I asked you here was to sneak in a warm-up before the final battle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002550_LYSE<tab>Enfin bref, ce n'est pas pour ça que je t'ai appelé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. J'avais surtout envie de me préparer mentalement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002560_LYSE<tab>There's this place I know where monks used to spar as part of their training. Care to join me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002560_LYSE<tab>Dis, tu veux bien faire un combat d'échauf<var 16 /var>fe<var 16 /var>ment avec moi<var 1D /var>? Il y a un endroit idéal pour ça ici<var 1D /var>: celui où les moines venaient s'entraîner autrefois. Affrontons-nous là-haut<var 1D /var>!
